name: Mystic Sailling: Brave captain
description:
Mystic Sailling: Brave captain

An anime RPG that bring you to a brand new world of a saillig age!
Find the legendary treasure and be the king of pirates!

GAME FEATURES

-Hero Collection
Planty of heroes with unique skills for you!

-Turn-based strategy
Victories' only determined by your wits!

-Idle system
Train your heroes anywhere, anytime!

-Share Levels & Gear
It can save your resource and time!

-Fascinating graphics
Fascinating graphics that totally recall your memory!
